master_direction: RBI Master Direction title or reference
circular: RBI circular number or circular identifier such as RBI/2023-24/45
notification: Government or RBI gazette notification reference such as G.S.R. 76(E)
regulation_section: Paragraph or clause reference such as Paragraph 3.2 or Section 45-IA
act: Act or statute such as Banking Regulation Act, 1949
scheme: RBI or Government scheme or product like Relief/Savings Bonds
nbfc: Non-Banking Financial Company name or category
regulator_body: Regulatory department or Reserve Bank unit
identifier: Codes and identifiers like IFSC, PAN, circular numbers
acronym: Acronym or abbreviation such as KYC, NPA
amount: Monetary amount including currency and units
time_period: Durations or frequencies such as quarterly, monthly, FY 2023-24
organization_unit: Operational/office units such as Receiving Offices
entity_type: Document or object types like Bond Ledger Account (BLA)
party: Legal parties such as issuer, subscriber, bondholder
title: Document or press release title/headline
